snippet.title: The Morrigan - Full Release Trailer [PC VR]
snippet.description:
Full Release trailer for The Morrigan, a virtual reality dungeon crawler set in a world of beautiful stylised graphics where you explore striking, handcrafted environments. Developed by The Pixel Mine, available for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality and Valve Index. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/the-morrigan

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com

SUPPORT US
